sentences.english: Wudang Mountain in Hubei province is the well-known "First Mountain of Taoism".

sentences.english: Situated in Danjiangkou, northwest Hubei, Mount Wudang is one of the famous mountains in China.

sentences.english: Seas of clouds enshroud the peaks of Mt. Wudang throughout the year.
There are rich resources of tourism and potential development in Wudang Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 武當山旅遊資源十分豐富，開發潛力巨大。

sentences.english: A big, wudang mountain is shiyan scenic, Taoism culture.
sentences.chinese: 武當山是十堰的一大名勝，是道教聖地。

sentences.english: People in Shiyan are proud of Mt. Wudang.
With the development of tourism, tourists to Mount Wudang Jinding successive incremental.
sentences.chinese: 隨着旅遊事業的發展，來武當山金頂的遊客連年遞增。
